summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to certain dances and dance venues; adding a new Chapter to the Seattle Municipal Code to regulate such dances and dance venues; providing penalties for violations; establishing a music and youth commission; and repealing Chapter 6.294 of the Seattle Municipal Code.
committee: Culture, Arts & Parks and Neighborhoods, Sustainability & Community Development
vote: 8-21-00: 7-1 Drago (Absent: Pageler); 9-18-00: Motion to pass over Mayor's veto failed 5-3 (Yes: Conlin, Licata, Nicastro, Steinbrueck, Wills; No: Compton, Drago, McIver; Excused: Pageler)
